website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses competitors for offering features that yoga enthusiasts love – outstanding quality, reasonable price, and a fit that most consumers will find comfortable and flexible.
pros: Offers a classic ankle-length, second-skin fit that's perfect for yoga moves and stretches
Comfortable, durable material is made to last and wicks away perspiration
Popular brand known for quality fabrics and active wear
cons: May fit snug on some body types, so you may benefit from ordering up in size

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in size medium, based on the description and reviews that they ran small. I'm 5'5" and 135 lbs, athletic build. I buy UA pants in small or medium, depending on the fit. These were really huge on me. Not only did they not provide compression, but they were super long (to be fair, I have short legs and favor a 7/8 cut legging). I probably could have done a small, but the length and all the extra material bunched up was off-putting. They appear well made and not see-through, despite being lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley-Bo-Bashley

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic - Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: These Are NOT Under Armour pants. I could tell right away the fabric felt totally different than my usual pants, it's very cheap, see-through. When I put them on they were way too stretchy to be compression pants. The tag is cheaply sewn on. I am returning and will be ordering directly from Under Armour. You can see in the photos the light shining through without me even stretching them
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey W

customer_reviews.title: defective garment
customer_reviews.text: wore pants once and the next time she wore them there was a hole in the seam of the crotch. This was a birthday gift for my granddaughter and was disappointed that they fell apart after wearing once If this was a gift from a thrift shop I would expect this but not for the price I paid Under. Armour
customer_reviews.author: ruth murray

customer_reviews.title: Great leggings that are absolutely NOT see through
customer_reviews.text: Great leggings that are absolutely NOT see through. Bought for body pump class, its hard to find leggings that don't become somewhat sheer when doing squats/lunges. Fit is true to size, I am almost 5'10 and there was a little extra baggy length at the ankle. That's the only reason why I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Best workout pants
customer_reviews.text: Sizes run a little small. I'm normally a medium, but I wear a large in Under Armour leggings (despite wearing a medium Under Armour shirt). I'm a bit curvy, though. I say if you have curves that the pants need to fit over, consider going up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff? Not the quality you would expect. Weird length. Very hot, not comfortable for "heatgear".
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I was sent a knockoff? These were super hot. They aren't what I expected at all from the HeatGear line. They are also strangely long and bunch up - while I'm not the tallest person in the world, none of the other leggings I've purchased (I have an entire dresser drawer full) are this long. I really need to get them hemmed...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty low waisted
customer_reviews.text: This sit pretty low on the waist. Im constantly pulling them up. Wear for walking around and the are pretty aggravating. Would never wear these to do any sort of vigorous exercise. Color is nice and the material isnt scratchy but having to pull them up constantly...😔..its too annoying. I rarely wear them bc of that.
customer_reviews.author: kim tindell

customer_reviews.title: Great under hockey gear!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for playing hockey as underthings to go under my pads. These are very comfortable, stay up without issue, and are not hot in the least. I highly recommend them for hockey and probably anything where you don’t want to worry about overheating.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wiltshire

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these leggings so much I bought 2! Great for my physical therapy, running errands and relaxing anywhere I want! Delivery was right on time, too!
customer_reviews.author: L. E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Fit great in the legs. The waistline keeps rolling down. Was very disappointed. I had my last pair of UA leggings for 10 years, and never had that problem
customer_reviews.author: Carri D.

customer_reviews.title: Made big
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10 and 70kg and I ordered the large. I was surprised that they were too loose. I'd suggest sizing down with these. I didn't like the fit at all. Sort of baggy in the crotch area, but that may have been alleviated if I opted for a smaller size. I wasn't overally impressed by the material or elasticity. I returned these and purchased the under armour heatgear ankle crop and the quality was far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: These are super tight and super compressed
customer_reviews.text: These are super tight and super compressed. The material is just not flexible enough. I wear a medium and squeezed into them. Very uncomfortable. I bought a similar pair from Champion, same type of material and they are much more comfortable than these Under Armor leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The leggings feel great and fit as expected. A little but of scrunching at the bottom, but don't impeded the feel or utility of the garment. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dra.JMP

customer_reviews.title: Squat proof
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings! Definitely size up if you have a single doubt or are in between sizes. Not high rise, but still very comfy for the gym and they are totally Squat Proof!! Size 3-4 in jeans, 5'5" ordered a Medium.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome compression, super comfy for all day and workouts, not too thick, not too thin!
customer_reviews.author: kakeq

customer_reviews.title: Cool and dry!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some pants that I could run in. I always feel uncomfortable in anything short. These are the ticket! I stayed cool and dry for the entire run!
customer_reviews.author: ocdamber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great Leggings at a reasonable price! Have purchased several colors and enjoy all of them!
customer_reviews.author: The Horn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Shiny smooth material.
customer_reviews.text: Good material and fit. Large is perfect for a 34" waist.
customer_reviews.author: Cee&Lee

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Not see through at all but can slide down sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Ran in these for the first time today and it was perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacci

customer_reviews.title: super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter-in-law and she loves them!! Super comfy and she loves how they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: I ordered by the size chart and they were easily a size too big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a gift. I ordered by the size chart and they were easily a size too big. I would say just order the size you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Under armour pants.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these i put them through torture in my first ever spartan race and they held up awesome. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Mom

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These speak for themselves, They are Under Armor. The best period
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great product but recommend sizing down
customer_reviews.text: Received the original product, but I recommend sizing down. This pair of leggings is advertised as compression style, but still needs to be sized down in order to get that compression experience. Overall a good product and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Out

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of these leggings are about an half inch wider than leggings should be. They gap around your ankles which looks horrible
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Work Out Legging
customer_reviews.text: Love these leggings. They are perfect for yoga/working out and wick moisture. They are squat proof and not see through which is a major plus too.
customer_reviews.author: JPhilly

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than the previous long ones and no zip pocket whatsoever. Will NOT order any more.
customer_reviews.author: KAL

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Just barely long enough for 5,9” height. Would like them in a tall option. Love under armour
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Leggings
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an Under Armour Heatgear legging and received a Nike one. My daughter needed it for a trip so I couldn't return it in time so I just had her use it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Logo peeling after first wash
customer_reviews.text: Liked them until after the first wash in cold water as per the instructions and the logo is already peeling and cracking off. Either defective or a knockoff. Contacted Under Armour directly about this.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Product was not true to size. All of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was not true to size. All of my other UA gear is size M, this M was so small I couldn't get it over my calves!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous ordering these in a medium but I did anyway. So happy with them, the fit was perfect..
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice work out pants. They run small. Order one size larger !
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: amazing performance
customer_reviews.text: these feel amazing...they are my go to leggings for crossfit and Spartan racing, I will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these leggings, and would highly consider buying more. They arrived promptly and fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, long lasting, shape holding, quick dying pants
customer_reviews.text: I have the capris in the same style. I love them so I ordered the full length leggings. The capris I've had for two years have kept their shape very well. I am 5'2" and 135lbs. Curvy shape and heavier on bottom than top. Size medium fits very well in waist, hips, butt and legs. Length is a little long by a couple inches but still looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: great product other than that
customer_reviews.text: i'm 5'6" and these were a little long. I rolled them up once and they did the trick. great product other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and fit well
customer_reviews.text: Underarmour is expensive, but I already know that. The pants are comfy, not see through, and fit well
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pants! So flattering. I wear them at least once a week in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Ainsley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Comfortable. I’ve worn Under Armour compression pants fur years now. These pants are sturdy. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: N.LO

customer_reviews.title: quality service got what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: quality product service I have come to expect from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Quality
customer_reviews.text: Came untouched in packaging. No damage or frays to the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Aavang

customer_reviews.title: Was quite unhappy. Pants were much shorter than other ...
customer_reviews.text: Was quite unhappy. Pants were much shorter than other UA leggings I own. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great leggings
customer_reviews.text: Well made, fits well, exactly what workout leggings should be.
customer_reviews.author: JeniferR

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit... but it's not a dri fit...got sweat showing in lots of areas after workout!!!!
customer_reviews.author: 2 Boys' Mom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings. They are perfect for running in 40 degree weather to breezy 65 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually worms!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly always cheaper out and got regular black leggings to wear under cosplay armor. Then tried these and holy damn, headgear is actually a thing and however small the difference it makes, it does make one compared to other leggings. I wear these under my stormtrooper and Samus armor cosplays!
customer_reviews.author: Hendo Art

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: They are my favorite pants right now. They are so soft, comfortable and if you sweat, it dries super fat
customer_reviews.author: Lliliany Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Best workout leggings ever
customer_reviews.text: Best workout leggings ever. I work out 6 days a week, and do everything from spinning to running to weights; these feel practically naked for all workouts, do not budge or slip, keep me relatively dry, and look great. I own three pairs and intend to continue to purchase until these are the only leggings in my wardrobe. Additionally, they are slick and sleek enough for 'athleisure'; I happily wear to brunch and for long-distance travel, and have not felt scruffy in them, not even when flying first class. Honestly could not recommend more.
customer_reviews.author: emma morgan

customer_reviews.title: These are good quality, but they aren't the same "Heat gear" ...
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality, but they aren't the same "Heat gear" leggings I bought before. The other ones had a thin, soft lining, almost like a microfleece. These do not. Still good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them most comfortable things on earth well-made so happy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them most comfortable things on earth well-made so happy
customer_reviews.author: Shannon greer

customer_reviews.title: You know you want these! :)
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I own several pairs. I like the compression. Good support when I am running. Definitely recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ash K

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and they're comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am typically a size 2/small. I ordered a small and these fit true to size. Great fit and they're comfortable. Perfect to wear to the gym for workouts year-round. As always, UA = great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L

customer_reviews.title: SAG
customer_reviews.text: The y stretch out and sag in the crotch while running
customer_reviews.author: CLO

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not overly pleased with these leggings, they're ok but not fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Absolute hit with my athelete.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these runner's tights. Already wants a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Becker

customer_reviews.title: I gave this a 3 star rating simply because it ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 3 star rating simply because it was the wrong size and I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peraino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it. fits well. keeps the sweat off my body
customer_reviews.author: firefly1015

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: always I trust in Under Armour for Leggings, is my secure decision
customer_reviews.author: Julissa Santos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this leggings. I ordered UA ColdGear compression leggings too, can't wait to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Lana

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Heatgear Armour Leggings
product_meta.description: Super-light HeatGear fabric updated to deliver superior coverage & support. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. 4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction . Anti-odor technology prevents the growth of odor-causing microbes . Ergonomic flatlock seams deliver a comfortable, chafe-free fit. Classic cropped construction for a chic new silhouette. Wide, flat waistband. Inseam: 28.5".
feature_bullets: Super light HeatGear fabric updated to deliver superior coverage & support
Material wicks sweat & dries really fast
4 way stretch construction moves better in every direction
Anti odor technology prevents the growth of odor causing microbes
Ergonomic flatlock seams deliver a comfortable, chafe free fit
